title: Couple's Brown-Skin, Lighter-Skin Kids Face Double Standard
teaser: NPR's Michele Norris concludes her conversation with Marc Quarles of Pacific Grove, Calif. His six-word submission to The Race Card Project: "With Kids, I'm Dad. Alone: Thug."
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
